1:-module(weblogic6xmonitor_SUITE).
    2:
    3:%% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.

    4:-compile(export_all).
    5:
    6:-include("ct.hrl").
    7:
    8:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

    9:%% Test server callback functions

   10:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   11:
   12:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   13:%% Function: suite() -> DefaultData

   14:%% DefaultData: [tuple()]  

   15:%% Description: Require variables and set default values for the suite

   16:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   17:suite() -> [{timetrap,{minutes,10}}].
   18:
   19:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   20:%% Function: init_per_suite(Config) -> Config

   21:%% Config: [tuple()]

   22:%%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.

   23:%% Description: Initiation before the whole suite

   24:%%

   25:%% Note: This function is free to add any key/value pairs to the Config

   26:%% variable, but should NOT alter/remove any existing entries.

   27:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   28:init_per_suite(Config) ->
   29:    Config.
   30:
   31:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   32:%% Function: end_per_suite(Config) -> _

   33:%% Config: [tuple()]

   34:%%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.

   35:%% Description: Cleanup after the whole suite

   36:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   37:end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   38:    ok.
   39:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   40:%% Function: all() -> TestCases

   41:%% TestCases: [Case] 

   42:%% Case: atom()

   43:%%   Name of a test case.

   44:%% Description: Returns a list of all test cases in this test suite

   45:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------      

   46:all() -> 
   47:    [correct_counter, correct_counter_safe, correct_value, correct_value_safe,
   48:	error_counter_server, error_counter_port, error_counter_user, 
   49:	error_counter_password, error_counter_jarfile, error_value_server, 
   50:	error_value_port, error_value_user, error_value_password, 
   51:	error_value_jarfile, error_value_counter].
   52:	
   53:%% Function: sequences() -> Sequences 

   54:%%Sequences = [{SeqName,Testcases}]

   55:%%SeqName = atom()

   56:%%Testcases = [atom()]

   57:%% Description: Returns a list of sequenced test cases in this test suite

   58:sequences() ->
   59:	[].
   60:	
   61:correct_counter(_Config) ->	
   62:	P = weblogic6x_monitor:new(),
   63:	Params = [{server, "192.168.0.137"}, {port, "7001"}, {usr, "system"}, {pwd, "weblogic"},	
   64:			{secure, "on"}, {weblogicJar, "weblogic.jar"}],
   65:	
   66:	Ret = P:getBrowseData(Params),
   67:	
   68:	{comment, Ret}.
   69:	
   70:correct_counter_safe(_Config) ->	
   71:	P = weblogic6x_monitor:new(),
   72:	Params = [{server, "192.168.0.137"}, {port, "7001"}, {usr, "system"}, {pwd, "weblogic"},	
   73:			{secure, "on"}, {weblogicJar, "weblogic.jar"}],
   74:	
   75:	Ret = P:getBrowseData(Params),
   76:	
   77:	{comment, Ret}.
   78:
   79:correct_value(_Config) ->
   80:	P = weblogic6x_monitor:new(),	
   81:	P:set_property(server, "192.168.0.137"),
   82:	P:set_property(port, 7001),
   83:	P:set_property(usr, "system"),
   84:	P:set_property(pwd, "weblogic"),
   85:	P:set_property(secure, false),
   86:	P:set_property(weblogicJar, "weblogic.jar"),
   87:	P:set_property(browse,[{"mydomain:Location=myserver,Name=myserver,Type=ServerSecurityRuntime/LockedUsersCurrentCount", "ServerSecurityRuntime:myserver/LockedUsersCurrentCount"},
   88:							{"mydomain:Location=myserver,Name=myserver_myserver_certificate_weblogic.rjvm.http.TunnelCloseServlet_482,ServerRuntime=myserver,Type=ServletRuntime/PoolMaxCapacity", "ServerRuntime:myserver/WebAppComponentRuntime:certificate/ServletRuntime:HTTPClntClose/PoolMaxCapacity"}]),
   89:
   90:	P:update(),
   91:	
   92:	{ok, {state_string, Good}} = P:get_attribute(state_string),
   93:	
   94:	{comment, Good}.
   95:	
   96:correct_value_safe(_Config) ->
   97:	P = weblogic6x_monitor:new(),	
   98:	P:set_property(server, "192.168.0.137"),
   99:	P:set_property(port, 7001),
  100:	P:set_property(usr, "system"),
  101:	P:set_property(pwd, "weblogic"),
  102:	P:set_property(secure, true),
  103:	P:set_property(weblogicJar, "weblogic.jar"),
  104:	P:set_property(browse,[{"mydomain:Location=myserver,Name=myserver,Type=ServerSecurityRuntime/LockedUsersCurrentCount", "ServerSecurityRuntime:myserver/LockedUsersCurrentCount"},
  105:							{"mydomain:Location=myserver,Name=myserver_myserver_certificate_weblogic.rjvm.http.TunnelCloseServlet_482,ServerRuntime=myserver,Type=ServletRuntime/PoolMaxCapacity", "ServerRuntime:myserver/WebAppComponentRuntime:certificate/ServletRuntime:HTTPClntClose/PoolMaxCapacity"}]),
  106:
  107:	P:update(),
  108:	
  109:	{ok, {state_string, Good}} = P:get_attribute(state_string),
  110:	
  111:	{comment, Good}.
  112:	
  113:error_counter_server(_Config) ->	
  114:	P = weblogic6x_monitor:new(),
  115:	Params = [{server, "192.168.0.136"}, {port, "7001"}, {usr, "system"}, {pwd, "weblogic"},	
  116:			{secure, "off"}, {weblogicJar, "weblogic.jar"}],
  117:

  119:	
  120:	{comment, Ret}.
  121:

  157:	
  158:error_value_server(_Config) ->
  159:	P = weblogic6x_monitor:new(),	
  160:	P:set_property(server, "192.168.0.139"),
  161:	P:set_property(port, 7001),

  168:
  169:	P:update(),

  172:	
  173:	{comment, Good}.
